Name: Cachaça Daiquiri
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Might not look like a Caipirinha but tastes like a Caipirinha - a very sophisticated refined Caipirinha.
Nutrition: One serving of Cachaça Daiquiri contains 169 calories
